name: M. Ward
description: '''Matthew Stephen "M." Ward''' (born October 4, 1973) is an American singer-songwriter, Grammy nominated producer and guitarist from [[Glendale, California]]. Ward's solo work is a mixture of [[Folk music|folk]] and [[blues]]-inspired [[Americana (music)|Americana]] [[analog recording]]s. He has released 10 studio albums since 1999, primarily through the independent label [[Merge Records]]. In addition to his solo work, he is a member of indie pop duo [[She & Him]] and folk-rock [[Supergroup (music)|supergroup]] [[Monsters of Folk]], and also participates in recording, producing, and playing with multiple other artists.
